import { parse } from 'postcss'; import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { IoMdAdd, IoMdClose, IoMdRemove } from 'react-icons/io'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { CartContext } from '../contexts/CartContext' const CartItem = ({item}) => { const { removeFromCart } = useContext(CartContext); const {id, title, image, price, amount } = item return (
{title}
removeFromCart(id)}className='text-xl cursor-pointer'>
{amount}
$ {price}
{`$ ${parseFloat(price * amount).toFixed(2)}`}
); }; export default CartItem;
